title: Gearty Grilling: Sandra Jovchelovitch on how should we think about slums?
itunes:author: Sandra Jovchelovitch
description: Contributor(s): Sandra Jovchelovitch | Sandra Jovchelovitch, Professor of Social Psychology, discusses how methods of social change in Brazil's favelas could be used to change the lives of slum-dwellers around the world.
itunes:summary: Contributor(s): Sandra Jovchelovitch | Sandra Jovchelovitch, Professor of Social Psychology, discusses how methods of social change in Brazil's favelas could be used to change the lives of slum-dwellers around the world.
